thread.title: BRIEF-‍Fitch Says Increase In Hawaiian Counties' Transient Accommodation Taxes Share Could Relieve Pressure​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-‍Fitch Says Increase In Hawaiian Counties' Transient Accommodation Taxes Share Could Relieve Pressure​
text:
March 27 (Reuters) - Fitch:
* SAYS INCREASE IN HAWAIIAN COUNTIES’ TRANSIENT ACCOMMODATION TAXES SHARE COULD RELIEVE PRESSURE​
* SAYS PROPOSED BILL TO RAISE SHARE OF TAT ALLOCATED TO HAWAIIAN COUNTIES FROM STATE COULD RELIEVE BUDGET PRESSURES FROM RISING COMPENSATION, PENSION COSTS
* ‍SAYS PROPOSED INCREASE IN TAT COULD AID HAWAIIAN COUNTIES’ ABILITY TO ABSORB INCREASING COSTS WITHOUT NEED TO RAISE PROPERTY TAXES/CUT SERVICES Source text for Eikon:
